Stygian Strike.name: Stygian Strike
Stygian Strike.flavor: To your enemy, you take on the appearance of its greatest fear, causing it to stumble back in terror.
Stygian Strike.onHit: As above, and you or one ally can make a melee basic attack against the target as an opportunity action at any point during the push.

Subconscious Horror.name: Subconscious Horror
Subconscious Horror.flavor: Your attack conjures a horrific vision that only you and your enemy can see.
Subconscious Horror.effect: You conjure a subconscious horror in an unoccupied square within 5 squares of you. The horror lasts until the end of your next turn. The horror is invisible to everyone but you and the target. Whenever the target starts its turn and can see the horror, the target must either end that turn farther away from the horror than where it started, by at least a number of squares equal to half its speed, or take 10 psychic damage and grant combat advantage until the start of its next turn.
Subconscious Horror.sustainMinor: The horror persists, and you can move it 4 squares.

Haunting Shadows.name: Haunting Shadows
Haunting Shadows.flavor: Doubts blur your enemiesâ€™ vision, making it hard for your foes to see the true threat before them.
Haunting Shadows.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. When you move, the zone moves with you, remaining centered on you. Your allies have concealment against enemies that are within the zone.
